response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will be even more beneficial to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe its true worth surpasses $1,200,000. However, I understand the importance of finding a mutually agreeable price. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to own this product for a special introductory price of $1,150,000.

This offer is not only a testament to my belief in the product's value but also a gesture of appreciation for considering it. I am certain it will serve you exceptionally well and bring you unparalleled benefits. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase. I am here to answer any questions you might have and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
